verses.verse: The Canaanite,<WH3669> the king<WH4428> of Arad,<WH6166> who lived<WH3427> in the South,<WH5045> heard<WH8085> tell that Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of Atharim;<WH871> and he fought<WH3898> against Israel,<WH3478> and took<WH7617> some of them captive.<WH7628>

Israel<WH3478> vowed<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "If you will indeed<WH5414> deliver<WH5414> this people<WH5971> into my hand,<WH3027> then I will utterly destroy<WH2763> their cities.<WH5892>"

Yahweh<WH3068> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Israel,<WH3478> and delivered up<WH5414> the Canaanites;<WH3669> and they utterly destroyed<WH2763> them and their cities:<WH5892> and the name<WH8034> of the place<WH4725> was called<WH7121> Hormah.<WH2767>

They traveled<WH5265> from Mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> by the way<WH1870> to the Red<WH5488> Sea,<WH3220> to compass<WH5437> the land<WH776> of Edom:<WH123> and the soul<WH5315> of the people<WH5971> was much discouraged<WH7114> because of the way.<WH1870>

The people<WH5971> spoke<WH1696> against God,<WH430> and against Moses,<WH4872> "Why have you brought us up<WH5927> out of Egypt<WH4714> to die<WH4191> in the wilderness?<WH4057> For there is no bread,<WH3899> and there is no water;<WH4325> and our soul<WH5315> loathes<WH6973> this light<WH7052> bread.<WH3899>"
Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> fiery<WH8314> serpents<WH5175> among the people,<WH5971> and they bit<WH5391> the people;<WH5971> and many<WH7227> people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> died.<WH4191>

The people<WH5971> came<WH935> to Moses,<WH4872> and said,<WH559> "We have sinned,<WH2398> because we have spoken<WH559> against Yahweh,<WH3068> and against you.<WH6419> Pray to Yahweh,<WH3068> that he take away<WH5493> the serpents<WH5175> from us.<WH4872>" Moses prayed<WH6419> for the people.<WH5971>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Make<WH6213> a fiery serpent,<WH8314> and set<WH7760> it on a standard:<WH5251> and it shall happen,<WH5391> that everyone who is bitten, when he sees it,<WH7200> shall live."

Moses<WH4872> made<WH6213> a serpent<WH5175> of brass,<WH5178> and set<WH7760> it on the standard:<WH5251> and it happened,<WH5175> that if a serpent had bitten<WH5391> any man,<WH376> when he looked<WH5027> to the serpent<WH5175> of brass,<WH5178> he lived.<WH2425>
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> traveled,<WH5265> and encamped<WH2583> in Oboth.<WH88>
They traveled<WH5265> from Oboth,<WH88> and encamped<WH2583> at Iyeabarim,<WH5863> in the wilderness<WH4057> which is before<WH6440> Moab,<WH4124> toward the sunrise.
From there they traveled,<WH5265> and encamped<WH2583> in the valley<WH5158> of Zered.<WH2218>

From there they traveled,<WH5265> and encamped<WH2583> on the other side<WH5676> of the Arnon,<WH769> which is in the wilderness,<WH4057> that comes out<WH3318> of the border<WH1366> of the Amorites:<WH567> for the Arnon<WH769> is the border<WH1366> of Moab,<WH4124> between Moab<WH4124> and the Amorites.<WH567>
Therefore it is said<WH559> in the book<WH5612> of the Wars<WH4421> of Yahweh,<WH3068> "Vaheb<WH2052> in Suphah,<WH5492> the valleys<WH5158> of the Arnon,<WH769>
the slope<WH793> of the valleys<WH5158> that incline<WH5186> toward the dwelling<WH3427> of Ar,<WH6144> leans<WH8172> on the border<WH1366> of Moab.<WH4124>"

From there they traveled to Beer:<WH876> that is the well<WH875> of which Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Gather<WH622> the people<WH5971> together,<WH622> and I will give<WH5414> them water.<WH4325>"
Then sang<WH7891> Israel<WH3478> this song:<WH7892> "Spring up,<WH5927> well;<WH875> sing to it:<WH6030>

the well,<WH875> which the princes<WH8269> dug,<WH2658> which the nobles<WH5081> of the people<WH5971> dug,<WH3738> with the scepter,<WH2710> and with their poles.<WH4938>" From the wilderness<WH4057> they traveled to Mattanah;<WH4980>
and from Mattanah<WH4980> to Nahaliel;<WH5160> and from Nahaliel<WH5160> to Bamoth;<WH1120>
and from Bamoth<WH1120> to the valley<WH1516> that is in the field<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> to the top<WH7218> of Pisgah,<WH6449> which looks<WH8259> down<WH6440> on the desert.<WH3452>
Israel<WH3478> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> saying,<WH559>

"Let me pass<WH5674> through your land:<WH776> we will not turn<WH5186> aside into field,<WH7704> or into vineyard;<WH3754> we will not drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the wells:<WH875> we will go<WH3212> by the king<WH4428>'s highway,<WH1870> until we have passed<WH5674> your border.<WH1366>"

Sihon<WH5511> would not allow<WH5414> Israel<WH3478> to pass<WH5674> through his border:<WH1366> but Sihon<WH5511> gathered<WH622> all his people<WH5971> together,<WH622> and went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> into the wilderness,<WH4057> and came<WH935> to Jahaz;<WH3096> and he fought<WH3898> against Israel.<WH3478>

Israel<WH3478> struck<WH5221> him with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and possessed<WH3423> his land<WH776> from the Arnon<WH769> to the Jabbok,<WH2999> even to the children<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983> for the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> was strong.<WH5794>
Israel<WH3478> took<WH3947> all these cities:<WH5892> and Israel<WH3478> lived<WH3427> in all the cities<WH5892> of the Amorites,<WH567> in Heshbon,<WH2809> and in all its towns.<WH1323>

For Heshbon<WH2809> was the city<WH5892> of Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who had fought<WH3898> against the former<WH7223> king<WH4428> of Moab,<WH4124> and taken<WH3947> all his land<WH776> out of his hand,<WH3027> even to the Arnon.<WH769>
Therefore those who speak in proverbs<WH4911> say,<WH559> "Come<WH935> to Heshbon.<WH2809> Let the city<WH5892> of Sihon<WH5511> be built<WH1129> and established;<WH3559>

for a fire<WH784> has gone out<WH3318> of Heshbon,<WH2809> a flame<WH3852> from the city<WH7151> of Sihon.<WH5511> It has devoured<WH398> Ar<WH6144> of Moab,<WH4124> The lords of the high places<WH1181> of the Arnon.<WH769>

Woe<WH188> to you,<WH4124> Moab! You are undone,<WH6> people<WH5971> of Chemosh!<WH3645> He has given<WH5414> his sons<WH1121> as fugitives,<WH6412> and his daughters<WH1323> into captivity,<WH7622> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites.<WH567>
We have shot<WH3384> at them.<WH2809> Heshbon has perished<WH6> even to Dibon.<WH1769> We have laid waste<WH8074> even to Nophah,<WH5302> Which reaches to Medeba.<WH4311>"
Thus Israel<WH3478> lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the Amorites.<WH567>
Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> to spy out<WH7270> Jazer;<WH3270> and they took<WH3920> its towns,<WH1323> and drove out<WH3423> the Amorites who were there.<WH567>

They turned<WH6437> and went up<WH5927> by the way<WH1870> of Bashan:<WH1316> and Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316> went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> them,<WH5971> he and all his people, to battle<WH4421> at Edrei.<WH154>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Don't<WH3372> fear him:<WH5414> for I have delivered him into your hand,<WH3027> and all his people,<WH5971> and his land;<WH776> and you shall do<WH6213> to him as you did<WH6213> to Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who lived<WH3427> at Heshbon.<WH2809>"
So they struck<WH5221> him,<WH1121> and his sons and all his people,<WH5971> until there was none<WH1115> left<WH7604> him remaining:<WH8300> and they possessed<WH3423> his land.<WH776>
